search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Qwilr (qwilr.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official URL for Qwilr's pricing page: [https://qwilr.com/pricing/](https://qwilr.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing | Find the Right Plan for Your Team | Qwilr

extracted_content.content:
Start with content and scale with automation

The tool to build an interactive and automated proposal process.

MonthlyAnnually

![Image 1](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/vhpgdzfc/production/a14bd796645ff0365444b0ad8dffb128b71c9938-40x40.svg?q=100&auto=format)

Business
--------

Save

10

%

Best for smaller teams or individuals who want to create professional proposals, capture e-signatures, collect payments, and use HubSpot.

$

35

/person  
/month

### Key features

*   Content editor
    
*   e-sign
    
*   QwilrPay
    
*   Pricing & quotes
    
*   Page analytics
    
*   HubSpot CRM
    
*   Notifications
    

### Use with:

*   HubSpot CRM
    
*   Pipedrive CRM
    
*   Zoho CRM
    

![Image 2](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/vhpgdzfc/production/b6305dd04bef3755b122bbd6c3bb556e70f7bea9-40x40.svg?q=100&auto=format)

Enterprise
----------

For larger teams using Salesforce who want to scale and automate their proposal process with CRM automations, security, and advanced analytics.

$

59

/person  
/month

Billed annually (10 seat min)

### Everything from business, plus:

*   Account manager
    
*   Custom branding
    
*   Team permissions
    
*   Identity verification
    
*   Domain-restricted access
    
*   Template-level settings
    

### Use with:

*   Salesforce CRM
    
*   HubSpot CRM
    
*   Pipedrive CRM
    
*   Zoho CRM
    

Editor

Business

Enterprise

Unlimited document creation

Qwilr Pages are easy-to-create web pages you can share anywhere using a link. They're unlimited, so you can create as many as you'd like.

Dynamic content

Embed ROI calculator, forms, videos, Google maps, spreadsheets, Google Slides and more.

Expert branding update

Get key documents refreshed and converted into Qwilr pages, to accelerate your team.

Custom domains

Your Qwilr pages will be accessible from a branded URL that doesn’t contain any reference to Qwilr, e.g. documents.yourbusiness.com.

Custom fonts

Upload your custom fonts for use in Qwilr Pages across your account.

Qwilr branding removed from emails

Remove all Qwilr branding on confirmation emails.

PDF export

Download Qwilr Pages as PDFs for printing and offline access.

Users

Minimum users

Invite your team to Qwilr to create beautiful sales and marketing collateral.

1

10

E-Signature, Pricing & Quotes

E-signature / document acceptance

Quote tables

Create flexible and [interactive quotes](https://qwilr.com/product/quotes-and-payments/) to help upsell your services and products. Choose from a quote table, tiered plans or a combination of both.

Pricing plans

Discounts

Display and uphold discounts in your pricing plans or quote tables.

CRM-integrated quotes

Connect your CRM and generate quotes and proposals automatically from your CRM. Using our tokens, data and pricing will automatically pull in to your Qwilr pages.

Payments

QwilrPay

QwilrPay lets you collect payment via popular methods like credit cards, bank debits (like ACH), and digital wallets. Allow part and full payments.

QwilrPay Application Fee

These are the fees that Qwilr charges, per transaction, for access to QwilrPay.

0.09%

0.05%

Analytics & Notifications

Email notifications

Receive instant email notifications whenever your pages are viewed or accepted, stalled, and more.

Slack notifications

Receive instant Slack notifications whenever your pages are viewed or accepted, stalled, and more.

Track page viewers

Get deep insights into viewer sessions, where they're viewing from, and how long they're spending on your pages. Note: to identify and verify page viewers, you'll need to purchase the Enterprise plan.

Detailed content analytics

Get deep insights into how your viewers engaged with your pages, including interactions and time spent.

Activity timeline

Get a full historical view of everything that happens on your Qwilr pages from the time it's first drafted to accepted and signed.

Data history

View up to 5 years of reporting history.

120 days

5 years

Automations & Integrations

Automations (HubSpot)

Set up automations to move a deal to closed lost, update deal amounts, close dates, sync data and more.

Automations (Salesforce) coming soon

Automations for Salesforce customers are coming soon. You'll soon be able to move a deal to closed lost, update deal amounts, close dates, sync data and more.

CRMs: Pipedrive, Zoho CRM, HubSpot

Integrate with your CRM to automatically produce personalized Qwilr Pages for clients and update clients' CRM records.

Salesforce

Integrate with Salesforce to automatically produce personalized Qwilr Pages for clients and update clients' CRM records. Salesforce is only avilable via our Enterprise plan.

All other integrations

Qwilr offers a range of integrations.

*   Remarketing integrations: Integrate with Facebook, Google Ads or AdRoll to recapture the attention of your page visitors across the web with ads.
*   Accounting integrations: Integrate QuickBooks to automatically invoice clients when your pages are accepted.
*   Analytics integrations: Integrate with Google Analytics, Mixpanel or Heap Analytics to get deep insights into how your visitors are engaging with your pages.
*   Interaction recording integrations: Integrate with Hotjar, FullStory or CrazyEgg to watch how your visitors engage with your pages.
*   Live chat integrations: Integrate with Olark, Intercom, Crisp or Slaask to chat directly with visitors or clients as they’re viewing your pages.

Team Management

Collaborative editing

Work on the same page at the same time with your colleagues, and share a view-only link to non-Qwilr users.

Editing permissions

Give your team edit or view-only access to protect important or confidential documents.

Team permissions

Set up permissions for different teams inside Qwilr to share pages and templates to private groups.

Template settings

Determine how your team shares pages with template-level settings.

Security

Audit trail

Get a complete audit trail of your documents created in Qwilr.

Time limits

Protect your Qwilr Pages from being viewed beyond specified dates.

View limits

Protect your Qwilr Pages from being viewed more than a limited number of times.

Domain-restricted access

Protect your Qwilr Pages from being viewed by anyone outside a specific email domain.

Password protection

Protect your Qwilr Pages with custom passwords.

Identify verification

Request your page viewers identify themselves through email or by signing up.

Support

Email support

A global [support team](https://qwilr.com/outstanding-support/) available 24/7 to help with any questions you have about Qwilr. We target a response rate of under 1 hour for all plans.

Help centre

A comprehensive set of guides to help you and your team make the most of Qwilr.

Chat support

Live chat support with our friendly Support team.

Training sessions

Account manager

A dedicated account manager will help you and your team accelerate.

Business

Enterprise

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Yes. All pricing is in USD.

When you sign up to Qwilr, you’ll immediately get a free 14-day trial of our Business plan, with unrestricted access to try all of our Business plan features. No contract or credit card details needed. Before your trial ends, you can choose to continue on the Business plan or choose another option. Once the trial expires, your Qwilr Pages will still be live for 30 days, but you will no longer have access to your account.

You can add or remove users anytime. When you update the number of users, your bill will immediately be charged or credited as needed. Keep in mind that your base subscription to our Business plan comes with 1 included user, and our Enterprise plan comes with 10. If you reduce the number of users below those levels, you'll still be billed for the base subscription.

You can cancel your plan anytime. If you decide to cancel, your Qwilr Pages will be turned off, and you’ll will no longer have access to your account at the end of the billing period.

Teams over the size of 4 users will get either an implementation manager or Customer Success Manager depending on their plan choice, and what onboarding package they purchase. You can [view onboarding package options here](https://pages.qwilr.com/Qwilr-Professional-Services-UPDATED-2024-CY3g2ugeQ1aT).

Get discounted annual pricing on our Business plan by paying upfront for a full 12 months of Qwilr. Our Business plan costs $35 per month when billed annually or $39 per month when billed monthly. We do offer multi-year discounts and quarterly pricing on request. Contact sales to get a custom quote for your team.

Yes, there are some small fees for collecting payments through Qwilr. Typically, however, they are no more than a few percentage points.

These fees are detailed below:

Payment Gateway Processing Fee: These fees are set by Stripe and can be found [here](https://stripe.com/pricing).

QwilrPay Application Fee: this may appear as an ‘application fee’ or ‘platform fee’ in the Stripe invoice.

This is the fee that Qwilr charges, per transaction, for access to QwilrPay. At a base level:

*   Business: 0.09% per transaction
*   Enterprise: 0.05% per transaction

Yes! Get in touch, and we'll help you out.

Get to 'yes' faster with Qwilr. Try it today with a free 14-day trial. No credit cards or contracts.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a 10% discount for annual billing. Minimum user requirements apply for each plan.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Best for smaller teams or individuals who want to create professional proposals, capture e-signatures, collect payments, and use HubSpot.
For larger teams using Salesforce who want to scale and automate their proposal process with CRM automations, security, and advanced analytics.

additional_fees.fee_description: Fees set by Stripe for payment processing.
